name: dexler-astro
title: Dexler Astro
desc: A modern full featured SaaS theme for your business
article:
Dexler is an up-to-date SaaS theme crafted using Astro 4 and TailwindCSS. It includes more than 12 pre-designed pages, making it ideal for creating an impressive and polished website for your SaaS business. Additionally, it offers extensive customization options, allowing you to effortlessly adjust colors, fonts, and layout to align with your brand vision.


Key Features


  1. 12+ Unique Pages
  2. Highly customizable (Color, Font, Menu, Social Links, SEO Meta Tags, etc.)
  3. Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4
  4. Netlify setting pre-configured
  5. Contact form support
  6. Taxonomy support
  7. Support Disqus comments
  8. Write and update content in Markdown / MDX
  9. MDX components auto import
  10. Fully responsive on desktops, tablets, and smartphones
  11. SEO Friendly
  12. Simple and easy development environment setup
  13. Free Google fonts
  14. Font Awesome icons
  15. Lifetime free updates


Pages


  1. About Us
  2. Service
  3. Service details
  4. Pricing
  5. Blog
  6. Blog single
  7. Careers
  8. Careers details
  9. How It Works
  10. Our team
  11. Contact
  12. Elements
  13. Terms & conditions
  14. Custom 404
